Package gw.api.claim

Class ClaimUtil

java.lang.Object
gw.api.claim.ClaimUtil
public class ClaimUtil extends Object
Utility methods for working with Claims.

    • getActivities

      public static IQueryBeanResult<Activity> getActivities(Claim claim)
      Returns all open non assignment review activities on the claim
      Parameters:
      claim - for which activities are to be found
      Returns:
      query result containing all open non assignment review activities

    • getAvailableTypes

      public static ClaimSecurityType[] getAvailableTypes()
      Returns all non retired claim security type keys except for "unsecuredclaim"
      Returns:
      array of claim security type keys

    • addToSessionList

      public static void addToSessionList(Claim claim)
      Adds given claim to the claim session list so it will appear in the list of recently visited claims under the claim tab menu
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to be added

    • markClaimAsViewed

      public static void markClaimAsViewed(Claim claim)
      Marks the given claim as viewed; if this is the first time this user has viewed the claim today a new "viewed" history event is added to the claim history
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to mark

    • getCurrentClaimNumber

      public static String getCurrentClaimNumber()
      If we are on any page in the claim location group then return the number of the current claim, otherwise return null
      Returns:
      the current claim number, or null

    • getMostRecentlyVisitedClaim

      public static Claim getMostRecentlyVisitedClaim()
      Returns:
      the claim most recently visited by the current user or null if the user has never visited any

    • getRecentlyViewedClaims

      public static ClaimRecentView[] getRecentlyViewedClaims()
      Returns:
      the claims visited in the session.

      Gets whether the archiving feature is enabled in this configuration.
      Returns:

    • isArchivingAvailable

      public static boolean isArchivingAvailable()
      Gets whether the archiving feature is enabled and the archive is currently available.
      Returns:

    • getAvailableClaimSearchTypes

      public static List<ClaimSearchType> getAvailableClaimSearchTypes()
      Returns:
      the list of available claim search types, excluding ALL an any retired types

    • getAvailableFreeTextClaimSearchTypes

      public static List<FreeTextClaimSearchType> getAvailableFreeTextClaimSearchTypes()
      Returns:

    • sendToISO

      public static void sendToISO(Claim claim)
      This method puts the claim into a new bundle, sets its ISO status to "ResendPending", and then commits the bundle. This causes the event messaging rules to force a resend to ISO
      Parameters:
      claim - the claim to be sent to ISO.

    • doesClaimHaveUnsavedWork

      public static boolean doesClaimHaveUnsavedWork()
      Checks the claim currently being viewed through the UI for any unsaved work. The method assumes it is being called from a child PCF of Claim.
      Returns:
      True if the claim has unsaved work
